official_title: A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to audit annually the gold held by the United States on the first day of each fiscal year and to report his findings to the Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Comptroller General to audit the gold held by the United States on the first day of each fiscal year and to report the results of such audit to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to audit annually the gold held by the United States on the first day of each fiscal year and to report his findings to the Congress.
